section.name: About
section.p: Mercury is set of e-mail related projects. It currently has implementations of SMTP inbound server and IMAP 4rev1 server. Both are working based on Maildir JavaMail implementation.

subsection.name: 14th Nov 2007
subsection.p: Significant change is that project is re-organised and build as Maven project. There were some minor improvements and bug fixes.
